enhanced_posts.text:
The #Trump administration is aggressively rolling back #climate action: erasing data, slashing #research funding, and scrubbing “climate change” from federal websites.

Pallavi Sethi ( @pallavis.bsky.social @granthamlse.bsky.social) maps the rollback timeline.

Full post👉 ow.ly/xAcI50WzQUs

enhanced_posts.text:
So Ghislaine Maxwell gets a minimum security prison convicted of child sex trafficking after being interviewed by Deputy Attorney-General Todd Blanche. What public good is served by providing her better prison facilities. There are questions to be answered about this interview and the result.
#trump

Empfehlenswerter F.A.Z. Beitrag: Was kommt nach dem Ultimatum?

enhanced_posts.text: #Trump is and remains a senile chatterbox who has absolutely no idea about politics. Threats and repeated retreats—all just empty talk.
